properties.Name: ConsumerPaymentCardStatus
properties.Description: The status of the payment card as of the date for the associated reporting period.

Columns.Name: PaymentCardId
Columns.Description:
Primary Account Number (PAN) = The number that is embossed, encoded, or both, on a plastic card that identifies the issuer and the particular cardholder account.

The account number on the card, which is unique to every cardholder. The card number is used to identify the purchaser for authorization and billing purposes.

Columns.Name: ReportingDate
Columns.Description:
The date of the associated status.

Ex:

For the period Oct 1- Oct 31, the status of the credit card is detailed as of the date Oct 15.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The reporting period start date.

Columns.Name: ReportingPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The reporting period end date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardCurrentBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The current total amount owed in order to pay off credit card balance as of the associated date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardMinimumPaymentDueAmount
Columns.Description: The current minimum due to be paid for the associated reporting period.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPastDueAmount
Columns.Description: The amount past due for the associated reporting period.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodHighBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The highest balance amount for the reporting period and as of the status date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodAverageDailyBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The average daily balance for the reporting period and as of the status date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodLowBalanceAmount
Columns.Description: The low balance amount for the reporting period and as of the status date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodLineOfCreditAmount
Columns.Description: The line of credit amount available for the reporting period and associated effective date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodInterestRatePercentage
Columns.Description: The current or effective APR for the associated reporting period and date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodCashAdvancesInterestRatePercentage
Columns.Description: The interest rate charged for cash advances as of the associated date and reporting period.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodCashAccessLineAmount
Columns.Description: The maximum amount of cash access assigned to the credit card account as of the associated date and reporting period.

Columns.Name: CreditCardPeriodTotalCashAdvancesAmount
Columns.Description:
The total amount of cash advances received by the credit card holder as of the associated date and reporting period.

A borrower may obtain cash "on the spot" by using their credit card at a bank or an ATM. 

The amount of the cash advance is deducted from your available credit line. A fee is often charged when obtaining cash advances. In addition, the interest rate is usually higher than on purchases and there is typically no grace period.

Columns.Name: CreditCardDailyPeriodicRate
Columns.Description: The Daily Periodic Rate is calculated by dividing the Annual Percentage Rate by 365 and rounding the figure to the fifth decimal place for the reporting period and associated status date.

Columns.Name: CreditCardOverTheLimitIndicator
Columns.Description:
Indicates that the borrower has accessed an amount of money larger than what is available in their credit line as of the status date.

Depending on the credit issuer, this may be permitted, but the borrower will usually be charged an "Over the Limit" fee.

Columns.Name: AccountStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.

Columns.Name: IsoCurrencyCode
Columns.Description: The ISO 4217 currency code.

Columns.Name: BillingCycleId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Billing Cycle.
